content.text: How can I get started with HiveFi?

I recommend self-hosting HiveFi for full control over your deployment. You'll need Python 2.7+, Node.js 23+, Git, and pnpm. The setup process is well-documented, and our Discord community provides excellent support. Would you like me to guide you through the installation steps?

For self-hosted deployments, you're looking at infrastructure costs of $5-20/month depending on your setup. The platform itself is open-source and free to use. You'll only need to cover API usage costs for services you integrate with. This gives you maximum flexibility and control over your expenses.
